name: Lubriderm Advanced Therapy Moisturizing Hand and Body Lotion
description: A clinically advanced, non-greasy lotion for deep hydration and restoration of the skin’s moisture barrier for both hands and body.
longDescription: Lubriderm Advanced Therapy Moisturizing Hand and Body Lotion is designed to deliver long-lasting hydration with a fast-absorbing, non-greasy formula that restores your skin’s natural moisture barrier. Ideal for daily use on both hands and body, this dermatologist-recommended lotion soothes and nourishes dry skin without leaving any residue. Its advanced therapeutic formulation helps lock in moisture, leaving your skin soft, smooth, and refreshed all day long.
